attributes.additional_details:
Why are people saying they are curing themselves with Cannabis Oil? 

We produce naturally anandamide and ag2 which mimic THC and cbd and work in the same way in our bodies. We have deficiencies in ECS and lack of cannabinoids when we are ill.
attributes.background: My father in law died from cancer and my mum is currently fighting it, and I know the science behind why Cannabis Oil especially THC is curing cancer amongst other illnesses. Backed by science.
